title: Stroke signs knowledge and factors associated with a delayed hospital arrival of patients with acute stroke in Kinshasa
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Igor KAZADI KABANDA, Credo KIANGEBENI NGONZO, Christian-Khalifa EMEKA BOWAMOU, Jean-Paul DIVENGI NZAMBI, Nono KIATOKO PONTE, Olivier TUYINAMA MADODA, Aliocha NKODILA NATUHOYILA, Jean-René M’BUYAMBA-KABANGU, Benjamin LONGO-MBENZA, Degani BANZULU BOMBA, Bernard KIANU PHANZU
